answers.answer: I'm also high risk. I'll be 9 weeks tomorrow. I had a mild form of preeclampsia with my first 8 years ago that started at 7 months. Since I had it with my son they automatically put me in high risk clinic and plus I have high blood pressure now and PVC (premature venticular contraction ) with my heart.  I see it as you get more visits to see little one! Good luck!
Yes, high risk due to 2nd time with preeclamplsia. Its a tough journey, take care of you and bub!

question: I am 32 weeks pregnant and a ftm. My doctor has classified me as high risk due to my blood pressure. My blood pressure has been stable through out my entire pregnancy with the help of medicine but they are making me go to the doctor every week to get an ultrasound and keep an eye on my fluids and make sure I dont get preeclampsia or go into preterm labor. Anyone else high risk or in a similar situation?
title: anyone else high risk?
